features.title: Fast & Secure
features.text: Viacoin is an open source cryptocurrency created in 2014, derived from the Bitcoin protocol. Viacoin has a total supply of 23,176,392 coins and has a 24 second block time, resulting in a transaction speed 25x faster than Bitcoin. Viacoin can handle 175 transactions per second without scaling through Segwit or Lightning Network, making it perfect for fast (micro)transactions

features.title: Auxiliary Proof-of-Work
features.text: Viacoin uses merged mining, also known as 'AuxPoW'. This allows miners to mine for more than one blockchain at the same time. A miner could mine Litecoin and Viacoin or any other Scrypt coin simultaneously. Miners have an incentive to mine Viacoin, even if the reward is low, as they are able to mine Viacoin for “free”. This results in a very high network hashrate, which highly increases the network security.

features.title: Atomic Swaps
features.text: With Viacoin you can perform cross-chain atomic swaps between different cryptocurrencies without using centralized exchanges. Viacoin was the first cryptocurrency to integrate Peter Todd's OP_CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY BIP 65 proposal. Our atomic swap contract uses SHA256 secret hashes (instead of RIPEMD160) as it is more secure and has wider compatibility with altcoins

features.title: Scalable
features.text: Viacoin has adopted SegWit. Segregated Witness helps to shrink the size of a transaction and cope with the UTXO growth. It also aims to increase the per-block transaction throughput by a factor of 2 or 3, while simultaneously making block syncing faster for new nodes. Viacoin will also integrate other features like Schnorr signatures, which will help lowering the transaction size and costs

features.title: Lightning Network
features.text: Viacoin is ready to use the Lightning Network. This enables improvements of several orders of magnitude in transaction throughput by moving the majority of transactions outside the consensus ledgers into payment channels. This allows millions to billions of transactions per second across the network. A capacity that blows away legacy payment rails

features.title: Dark Gravity wave
features.text: Dark Gravity Wave (DGW) is a new algorithm designed to address certain flaws such as the time warp attack in the KGW algorithm. This concept was first introduced in Dash, previously known as Darkcoin. It makes use of multiple exponential moving averages and simple move averages to achieve a smoother readjustment mechanism

roadmap.title: TREZOR HARDWARE WALLET SUPPORT
roadmap.text: TREZOR is one of the most trusted and secure ways to store your Viacoins. Isolate your private keys into the safety of TREZOR & enjoy Viacoin without risk. The best protection at no cost to your inconvenience.

roadmap.title: GENERAL BYTES ATM SUPPORT
roadmap.text: General Bytes is the leading cryptocurrency hardware manufacturer. They have sold over 1250+ ATMS spread across 40+ countries. Viacoin is now available on all General Bytes ATMs.

roadmap.title: BTCPAY SERVER SUPPORT
roadmap.text: BTCPay Server is an Open Source payment processor, written in C#, that conforms to the invoice API of Bitpay. This allows easy migration of your code base to your own, self-hosted payment processor. Viacoin is now available as a payment option

roadmap.title: VIACOIN CORE 0.15.1
roadmap.text: Viacoin Core 0.15.1 is a big update compared to its previous version. The following features and improvements are included: chainstate database restructure, valid block assertion, p2p network optimization, UTXO mempool optimization, block relay improvements, no keypool refill flush and upgrade LevelDB.

roadmap.title: VIALECTRUM 3.1.3.1
roadmap.text: Updated Vialectrum lightweight wallet with improved functionality and bug fixes.

roadmap.title: VIALECTRUM 3.2.2
roadmap.text: Vialectrum is a fast, secure and very easy to use lightweight Viacoin client. Your funds are securely stored and can easily be recovered from any device using a secret phrase. Vialectrum 3.2.2 comes with faster transaction signing, hardware wallet improvements, an optional 'dark theme', several bug fixes and more

roadmap.title: VIACOIN CORE 0.16
roadmap.text: Viacoin Core 0.16 will feature the following: bech32 address support, sha256 hashing optimizations (which leads to faster synchronization and block validation), HD wallets by default, several bug fixes and other optimizations.

roadmap.title: VIACOIN ECLAIR
roadmap.text: Viacoin Eclair is an implementation of the Viacoin Lightning Network. Viacoin Eclair enables you to run your own Viacoin Lightning Network node and make Viacoin Lightning Network payments. Opening and closing channels is much fast than Bitcoin due to Viacoin's 24 second block time.

roadmap.title: VIACOIN COPAY
roadmap.text: ecure your personal funds with multiple signatures, or just one. Take security into your own hands and avoid trusting third parties with your savings. Like a joint-checking account, your Viacoin Copay wallet can have multiple users. Manage shared funds with friends and coworkers. Share a wallet with your child and introduce them to Viacoin. Viacoin Copay makes sharing a wallet simple and secure.

roadmap.title: VIACOIN SAMOURAI
roadmap.text: A modern Viacoin wallet hand forged to keep your transactions private, your identity masked, and your funds secure. Currently available for Bitcoin: samouraiwallet.com.

roadmap.title: VIACOIN ECLAIR WALLET
roadmap.text: Viacoin Eclair Wallet is a next generation, Lightning-ready Viacoin wallet. It can be used as a regular Viacoin wallet, and can also connect to the Viacoin Lightning Network for cheap and instant payments.

roadmap.title: ZAP LIGHTNING NETWORK WALLET
roadmap.text: Trustlessly send and receive viacoins instantly with minimal fees via the Lightning Network. Zap is a free Lightning Network wallet focused on user experience and ease of use, with the overall goal of helping the cryptocurrency community scale Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Currently available for Bitcoin: zap.jackmallers.com.

roadmap.title: VIAD (VIACOIN GOLANG)
roadmap.text: Full node implementation of Viacoin written in Go programming language.

roadmap.title: NVIACOIN
roadmap.text: NViacoin is the most complete Viacoin library for the .NET platform. It provides low level access to Viacoin primitives so you can easily build your application on top of it. NViacoin is an important component for BTCPay and Styx (which uses TumbleBit).

roadmap.title: VIACOINJ
roadmap.text: Viacoin Core alternative implementation in Java. ViacoinJ is a library for working with the Viacoin protocol. It can maintain a wallet, send/receive transactions without needing a local copy of Viacoin Core and has many other advanced features. It’s implemented in Java but can be used from any JVM compatible language.

roadmap.title: LIGHTNING NETWORK DAEMON (LND)
roadmap.text: Faster and cheaper than Bitcoin. The Lightning Network Daemon (lnd) is a complete implementation of a Lightning Network node.

roadmap.title: Viacoin Bech32 for Native SegWit addresses
roadmap.text: Bech32 addresses are natively SegWit compatible, meaning the transaction doesn’t need extra space to put SegWit in the P2SH address. It also has more advantages like smaller QR codes, stronger protection against typing errors, enables auto completion and only consisting of lower cases. Vialectrum 3.1.3.1 and Coinomi are already support Bech32 addresses. Ledger and Viacoin Core 0.16 wil add Bech32 support soon.

roadmap.title: C-LIGHTNING
roadmap.text: C-lightning is a standard compliant implementation of the Lightning Network protocol. The Lightning Network is a scalability solution for Viacoin, enabling secure and instant transfer of funds between any two parties for any amount.

roadmap.title: SCHNORR SIGNATURES
roadmap.text: The successor of Elliptic Curve Digital Signatures. It is a more efficient algorithm than Elliptic Curve Digital Signatures. Schnorr signatures support “native multisig” which enables the aggregation of multiple signatures into a single one valid for the sum of the keys. /batch validation. It could reduce the use of storage & bandwidth by 25% or more.

roadmap.title: MAST (MERKELIZED ABSTRACT SYNTAX TREES)
roadmap.text: Node Interaction with Merkle Trees. M.A.S.T allows Viacoin transaction validation scripts to be stored in partially-hashed form and nodes to interact with the merkle tree. This enables complicated redemption conditions, improves privacy by hiding unexecuted branches & allows inclusion of non-consensus enforced data. MAST allows for complicated smart contracts to be created on the VIA blockchain without clogging it up.

roadmap.title: STYX ANONYMOUS TRANSACTIONS
roadmap.text: Styx is an unlinkable anonymous atomic payment hub for Viacoin. Read our STYX Whitepaper.

roadmap.title: RSK SMART CONTRACTS
roadmap.text: Ethereum Compatible Smart Contracts. Rootstock is a smart contract platform which has a two-way peg. The idea is to enable it to work with smart contracts. Rootstock runs a turing complete Virtual machine called Rootstock Virtual Machine (which is also compatible with Ethereum virtual machine!) and allows solidity compiled smart contracts to run.
